Description: * Added a new hero, {{PageRef|Shiv}} Shiv
* Games can now be watched by an unlimited number of spectators
* Spectator games now have 1 minute delay
* Added localization for Simplified Chinese, Russian, Brazilian Portuguese, Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Latin America), Turkish, Ukrainian, Czech, and French. These are currently a work-in-progress.
* Language can be selected from the settings menu
* Matchmaking windows are now open 1 hour earlier in all regions
* You can now prioritize your roster into three groups to indicate your preference ordering to the matchmaker: Selected, Priority, High Priority
* Added customization options for your crosshair
* Builds: You can now author a suggested ordering of Ability Upgrades
* Builds: You can now add per-item author comments by right clicking on items while editing builds that will show up in the item tooltip for users of the build
* Fixed a bug that allowed published build data to overwrite local changes to a published build
* Fixed a bug that prevented the last used hero build from loading when it was not a favorited build
* Hovering items in the shop will now highlight their components, or which item they are components of
* Reworked the Hero Stats UI in the shop
* Hero Stats in the shop have been expanded and are now broken up by Weapon, Vitality, and Spirit. Various additional stats that were previously hidden have been added here.
* Individual stats can now be hovered over to see a breakdown of all the bonuses contributing to a value, including things like golden statues
* Added descriptive gun information to each hero
* Added Spirit Power Impact panel that displays the effect of Spirit Power on your Abilities and Items
* Added Outgoing Damage as a UI display mode that you can toggle through
* Added a setting to let you customize the ability cancel hotkey (default is spacebar)
* Added a "Friends Only" checkbox to filter the watch tab
* Added an option to control zoom sensitivity
* Fixed Candle Troopers sometimes instantly disappearing on death rather than going into their death flash state
* Using an active item or ability removes the undo option for the item/AP
* Fixed some abuse cases with undoing AP cooldown reductions
* Added a video setting to reduce flashing effects
* Unpause hotkey is now displayed when the game is paused
* Pause cooldown per player increased from 10 minutes to 15 minutes
* Improved visual clarity of {{PageRef|Grey Talon}} Grey Talon's trap armed state
* Replaced the Urn drop parachute with new effects
* Fixed some cases where the comeback souls would be higher than intended in the early game
* Fixed being unable to ping while dead
* Fixed {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop's {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} Sticky Bomb sometimes misfiring
* Improved smoothing of spectator camera position and angles
* Fixed a bug that allowed teleporters to be used while carrying the Soul Urn
* Fixed targeting previews that draw a model (like {{PageRef|McGinnis}} McGinnis's turrets) to update every frame, instead of being fixed at 60hz
* Fixed stuns resetting their duration if you were on the ground and became airborne
* Fixed some cases where {{PageRef|Lash}} Lash's {{PageRef|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike would cause your hero to be stuck
* Fixed {{PageRef|Ricochet}} Ricochet sometimes shooting the extra bullet from your gun rather than the target
* Fixed {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam T3 range not being calculated correctly when you have range increase items
* Fixed ESC not working to close Settings popup sometimes
* Various visual adjustments on highlight and strobe effects being too loud in some cases
* Holding M1 down while {{PageRef|Flame Dash}} Flame Dash ends will now cause you to fire your gun instead of requiring you to let go and press again
* Added popup to bot games to indicate that they tend to be much longer games than normal ones
* Improved {{PageRef|Abrams}} Abrams Siphon and {{PageRef|Seismic Impact}} Seismic Impact visuals to not obstruct player view as much
* Added new Silence status effect sound
* Updated bullet whizby sounds for nearly all characters
* Updated {{PageRef|Haze}} Haze {{PageRef|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger cast, projectile loop and whizby
* Updated {{PageRef|Haze}} Haze {{PageRef|Smoke Bomb}} Smoke Bomb sound
* Removed {{PageRef|Haze}} Haze {{PageRef|Smoke Bomb}} Smoke Bomb voice line for everyone except the casting player and spectators
* Fixed some spectator/replay sound and music bugs
* Various sound related performance improvements
* More impactful damage indication sound for attackers
* Remastered {{PageRef|Abrams}} Abrams, {{PageRef|Pocket}} Pocket, and {{PageRef|Dynamo}} Dynamo weapon fire sounds
* Improved lighting performance around shop
* Improved {{PageRef|Wraith}} Wraith tracers to feel more connected to their bullet
* Improved visibility of AOE around {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop while casting {{PageRef|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam
* Improved effects around {{PageRef|Lady Geist}} Lady Geist {{PageRef|Soul Exchange}} Soul Exchange to help with clarity
* Updated {{PageRef|Infernus}} Infernus tracer, muzzle, and impact fx revisions for better performance
* Fixed Mimic options in sandbox not working properly
* Added a sound for movement being restricted by {{PageRef|Slowing Hex}} Slowing Hex and {{PageRef|Vindicta}} Vindicta tether
* Revised sounds for {{PageRef|Pocket}} Pocket {{PageRef|Flying Cloak}} Flying Cloak duration and warp
* Clarified {{PageRef|Vindicta}} Vindicta {{PageRef|Flight}} Flight T1 tooltip
* Added alternate shop music
* Added {{PageRef|Refresher}} Refresher cast sound
* Teleporter activation no longer gets canceled on incoming damage.
* Teleporter channel time increased from 4s to 5s
* Walkers now require you to be within 30m to deal damage to them
* Walker Health increased by 15%
* Base Guardian Health increased by 20%
* Patron damage increased by 30% after it is vulnerable
* Weakened Patron Health increased by 15%
* Weakened Patron now has a {{PageRef|Torment {{PageRef|Pulse}} Pulse}} Torment {{PageRef|Pulse}} Pulse style effect, hitting up to 2 enemies in the pit for 75 damage per second
* You can now use melee hotkey while zoomed to exit zoom and perform a melee
* Added {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}} Bounce Pads in various areas of the map that launch you in a defined direction
bounce_pad_locations.jpg
* Added one-way defender exits beside each outer lane entrance
* Added Speed Boost Volumes in the defender passages on the outsides of the base
base_speed_boost.jpg
* Firehouse (building next to Sapphire Yellow Guardian) has been reworked to match the layout of the Chapel
* Low roof buildings beside Amber Purple Guardian and Sapphire Yellow Guardian are now valid play spaces
* Removed zap triggers
* Added truck on the back side of those buildings to allow climbing up
* Removed rooftop props for those buildings
* Added billboards to the edge closest to the lane
* Low roof buildings between inner lane Walker arenas are now valid play spaces
* Removed zap triggers
* Expanded rooftop size
* Added fire escape stairs to allow access from the upper level from the Mid
rooftop_locations_large.jpg
* Walker Arena - Amber Yellow/Sapphire Purple:
* Added catwalks from high ground defender area to building across the street
* Added passage through building and stairs up to a peek spot toward the Guardian
* Replaced upper floor juke spot with a connection through building across from new peek spot
amber_yellow_walker_arena.jpg
* Walker Arena - Amber Orange/Sapphire Blue:
* Added catwalk from the low roof building to the building across the street
* Replaced juke spot in the courtyard with passage connecting to the new catwalk
* Widened hallway above Underground Shop
* Removed railing and added stairs in the passage toward the Guardian
* Courtyard floor opening to the Underground Shop moved closer to above the shop
* {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}} Bounce Pad added to allow easier navigation from the Underground Shop to the upper courtyard. Replaces a juke spot.
amber_orange_walker_arena.jpg
* Walker Arena - Amber Blue/Sapphire Orange:
* Added interior shaft with {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}} Bounce Pad to an upper level balcony from defender side to face the Guardian
* Added a {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}} Bounce Pad on the ground floor of the Police Station/Garment Building to the upper floor
* Added a juke spot inside the Police Station/Garment Building
* Added a juke spot down the stairs from the Guardian to the left
amber_blue_walker_arena.jpg
* Walker Arena - Amber Purple/Sapphire Yellow:
* Added an interior corridor through the building between the base and the Walker
* Added a balcony that borders the arena on the back side of the Walker
amber_purple_walker_arena.jpg
* {{PageRef|Headshot Booster}} Headshot Booster: No longer has +40 Bonus Health
* {{PageRef|Headshot Booster}} Headshot Booster: Now has +40 Bullet Shield
* {{PageRef|Monster Rounds}} Monster Rounds: Health reduced from +65 to +50
* {{PageRef|Monster Rounds}} Monster Rounds: Now grants +30% Bullet Resistance vs NPCs
* {{PageRef|Restorative Shot}} Restorative Shot: Weapon Damage increased from 6% to 8%
* {{PageRef|Active Reload}} Active Reload: Lifesteal reduced from 40% to 30%
* {{PageRef|Active Reload}} Active Reload: Fire Rate reduced from 24% to 20%
* {{PageRef|Kinetic Dash}} Kinetic Dash: HP regen increased from 1 to 1.5
* {{PageRef|Long Range}} Long Range: Min distance reduced from 18m to 15m
* {{PageRef|Mystic Shot}} Mystic Shot: Cooldown increased from 5s to 6s
* {{PageRef|Slowing Bullets}} Slowing Bullets: Now grants +5 Spirit
* {{PageRef|Soul Shredder Bullets}} Soul Shredder Bullets: Now grants +6% Weapon Damage
* {{PageRef|Soul Shredder Bullets}} Soul Shredder Bullets: Debuff duration increased from 5s to 6s
* {{PageRef|Berserker}} Berserker: Fixed gaining stacks much faster than intended when taking damage from troopers
* {{PageRef|Warp Stone}} Warp Stone: Active Bullet Resist reduced from +60% to +40%
* {{PageRef|Warp Stone}} Warp Stone: No longer grants +2 Sprint
* {{PageRef|Warp Stone}} Warp Stone: Now gains +8 Spirit
* {{PageRef|Point Blank}} Point Blank: No longer grants +300 Bullet Shield
* {{PageRef|Point Blank}} Point Blank: Now grants +15% {{PageRef|Bullet Armor}} Bullet Armor
* {{PageRef|Escalating Resilience}} Escalating Resilience: Max Bullet Resist increased from 30% to 36%
* {{PageRef|Heroic Aura}} Heroic Aura: Lifesteal increased from 18% to 20%
* {{PageRef|Alchemical Fire}} Alchemical Fire: Bullet Shield increased from 175 to 225
* {{PageRef|Sharpshooter}} Sharpshooter: Min distance reduced from 18m to 15m
* {{PageRef|Titanic Magazine}} Titanic Magazine: Weapon Damage increased from 16% to 18%
* {{PageRef|Titanic Magazine}} Titanic Magazine: Bullet Resist increased from 8% to 10%
* {{PageRef|Intensifying Magazine}} Intensifying Magazine: Time for Max Damage reduced from 3.5s to 3s (this is a buff)
* {{PageRef|Ricochet}} Ricochet: Fire Rate increased from +8% to +12%
* {{PageRef|Ricochet}} Ricochet: Health increased from +125 to +150
* {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}} Siphon Bullets: You permanently steal 1 stack (45 HP) from the enemy if they die under the debuff. If an enemy you stole a stack from kills you, they regain 1 stack back.
* {{PageRef|Silencer}} Silencer: Reduced active duration from 6s to 4s
* {{PageRef|Glass Cannon}} Glass Cannon: Now gives +1 Movement Speed
* {{PageRef|Glass Cannon}} Glass Cannon: No longer gives +2 ammo on kill
* {{PageRef|Glass Cannon}} Glass Cannon: Weapon Damage reduced from +75% to +70%
* {{PageRef|Glass Cannon}} Glass Cannon: Now gives +10% Weapon Damage per kill (up to +50%)
* {{PageRef|Glass Cannon}} Glass Cannon: When you die you lose a stack
* {{PageRef|Melee Lifesteal}} Melee Lifesteal: Heal effectiveness vs non-heroes increased from 25% to 35%
* {{PageRef|Melee Lifesteal}} Melee Lifesteal: Health increased from +70 to +75
* {{PageRef|Extra Regen}} Extra Regen: Regen increased from 2.7 to 2.8
* {{PageRef|Healing Rite}} Healing Rite: Cooldown reduced from 75s to 65s
* {{PageRef|Healing Rite}} Healing Rite: Cast Range increased from 20m to 30m
* {{PageRef|Healing Booster}} Healing Booster: Spirit Resist reduced from +7% to +6%
* {{PageRef|Healing Booster}} Healing Booster: Bullet Resist reduced from +7% to +6%
* {{PageRef|Divine Barrier}} Divine Barrier: Duration increased from 4s to 5s
* {{PageRef|Divine Barrier}} Divine Barrier: Cooldown reduced from 30s to 28s
* {{PageRef|Restorative Locket}} Restorative Locket: Max Stacks reduced from 20 to 15
* {{PageRef|Restorative Locket}} Restorative Locket: Heal per stack increased from 30 to 40
* Health Nova: Health increased from +75 to +100
* {{PageRef|Combat Barrier}} Combat Barrier: Weapon Damage While Shielded increased from +24% to +28%
* {{PageRef|Enchanter's Barrier}} Enchanter's Barrier: Spirit Power while Shielded increased from +17 to +20
* {{PageRef|Bullet Lifesteal}} Bullet Lifesteal: Lifesteal increased from +26% to 28%
* {{PageRef|Superior Stamina}} Superior Stamina: Air Jump/Dash Distance reduced from +50% to +40%
* {{PageRef|Superior Stamina}} Superior Stamina: Fire Rate reduced from 10% to 7%
* {{PageRef|Debuff Remover}} Debuff Remover: Debuff resistance reduced from +40% to +35%
* {{PageRef|Lifestrike}} Lifestrike: Heal effectiveness vs non-heroes increased from 25% to 35%
* {{PageRef|Lifestrike}} Lifestrike: Heal increased from 45% of melee damage to +55%
* {{PageRef|Majestic Leap}} Majestic Leap: Health increased from +100 to +125
* {{PageRef|Majestic Leap}} Majestic Leap: Spirit Power increased from +8 to +10
* {{PageRef|Metal Skin}} Metal Skin: Cooldown reduced from 30s to 25s
* {{PageRef|Fortitude}} Fortitude: Out of combat regen timer reduced from 13s to 12s
* {{PageRef|Rescue Beam}} Rescue Beam: Cooldown reduced from 30s to 25s
* {{PageRef|Soul Rebirth}} Soul Rebirth: Rebirth Health increased from 40% to 50%
* {{PageRef|Soul Rebirth}} Soul Rebirth: Cooldown reduced from 240s to 200s
* {{PageRef|Inhibitor}} Inhibitor: Weapon Damage increased from 20% to 25%
* {{PageRef|Colossus}} Colossus: Slow increased from 20% to 25%
* {{PageRef|Colossus}} Colossus: Slow now affects stamina distances
* {{PageRef|Phantom Strike}} Phantom Strike: Cast range reduced from 35m to 30m
* {{PageRef|Infuser}} Infuser: No longer gives +7% Spirit Resist
* {{PageRef|Infuser}} Infuser: Now gives +50 Health
* {{PageRef|Spirit Strike}} Spirit Strike: Spirit damage increased from 40 to 50
* {{PageRef|Spirit Strike}} Spirit Strike: Debuff increased from -10% Spirit Resist to -12%
* {{PageRef|Mystic Reach}} Mystic Reach: Now gives +5% Spirit Resist
* {{PageRef|Ammo Scavenger}} Ammo Scavenger: Spirit Power Duration increased from 24s to 35s
* {{PageRef|Cold Front}} Cold Front: Damage reduced from 100 to 75
* {{PageRef|Cold Front}} Cold Front: Damage Spirit Power scaling increased from 1.25 to 1.5
* {{PageRef|Decay}} Decay: Healing Reduction reduced from -70% to -50%
* {{PageRef|Decay}} Decay: Bleed increased from 2.8% to 3.1%
* {{PageRef|Decay}} Decay: Cooldown increased from 25s to 30s
* {{PageRef|Slowing Hex}} Slowing Hex: Debuff no longer cancels active mobility spells, it only prevents them from being casted
* {{PageRef|Slowing Hex}} Slowing Hex: Damage reduced from 100 to 70
* {{PageRef|Slowing Hex}} Slowing Hex: Cast range reduced from 35m to 25m
* {{PageRef|Slowing Hex}} Slowing Hex: Now also reduces stamina distance by 30%
* {{PageRef|Slowing Hex}} Slowing Hex: Projectile speed increased from 1200 to 1350
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}} Withering Whip: Now applies -40% Fire Rate instead of a Disarm
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}} Withering Whip: Duration increased from 3s to 4.5s
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}} Withering Whip: Cast range increased from 18m to 24m
* {{PageRef|Quicksilver Reload}} Quicksilver Reload: Infused ability bonus damage increased from +30 to +50
* {{PageRef|Improved Cooldown}} Improved Cooldown: Cooldown reduction increased from 14% to 15%
* {{PageRef|Ethereal Shift}} Ethereal Shift: No longer provides +10% Fire Rate
* {{PageRef|Ethereal Shift}} Ethereal Shift: Cooldown increased from 25s to 30s
* {{PageRef|Improved Burst}} Improved Burst: Reduced Weapon Damage from +12% to +8%
* {{PageRef|Surge of Power}} Surge of Power: Movespeed duration increased from 5s to 6s
* {{PageRef|Surge of Power}} Surge of Power: Imbued Spirit increased from +26 to +28
* {{PageRef|Surge of Power}} Surge of Power: Now grants +75 Health
* {{PageRef|Improved Reach}} Improved Reach: Now gives +10% Spirit Resist
* {{PageRef|Superior Duration}} Superior Duration: Now provides +15% Weapon Damage
* {{PageRef|Mystic Slow}} Mystic Slow: Fire Rate reduction increased from -30% to -40%
* {{PageRef|Silence Glyph}} Silence Glyph: No longer reduces Spirit Resist
* {{PageRef|Silence Glyph}} Silence Glyph: Now deals +150 damage on impact
* {{PageRef|Superior Cooldown}} Superior Cooldown: Non-Imbued ability cd reduction increased from 22% to 24%
* {{PageRef|Escalating Exposure}} Escalating Exposure: Max Interval improved from 1s to 0.7s
* {{PageRef|Diviner's Kevlar}} Diviner's Kevlar: Cooldown increased from 30s to 60s
* {{PageRef|Refresher}} Refresher: Spirit Resist increased from 14% to 16%
* {{PageRef|Curse}} Curse: Cooldown increased from 40s to 50s
* Added a new T1 Weapon item. Grants +35% Bullet Projectile Speed, +14% Weapon Damage and +50 Bullet Shield.
Inspired by: https://forums.playdeadlock.com/threads/projectile-speed-increase-item.1539/

* Added a new T4 Spirit item, {{PageRef|Magic Carpet}} Magic Carpet: Active - After a 1.3s delay, a magic carpet arrives to pick you up. You gain full flight controls and have +6 m/s movement speed. Lasts 7 seconds. If you cast abilities or use your gun, the carpet disappears. While on the {{PageRef|Magic Carpet}} Magic Carpet you gain +400 Bullet and +400 Spirit Shields. Passively grants +150 Health, +10% Ability Duration, and +15 Spirit Power. Cooldown: 40s
Inspired by: https://forums.playdeadlock.com/threads/a-bunch-of-loose-item-ideas.11618/
* {{PageRef|Abrams}} Abrams: Fixed {{PageRef|Seismic Impact}} Seismic Impact often not dragging enemies in the air along with you when you are slamming down
* {{PageRef|Abrams}} Abrams: Fixed {{PageRef|Shoulder Charge}} Shoulder Charge not always placing enemies in front of you
* {{PageRef|Abrams}} Abrams: {{PageRef|Seismic Impact}} Seismic Impact damage reduced from 175 to 150
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: Gun range reduced from 50m to 30m + 2.5m/boon (max of 58m)
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: Speed while shooting increased from 55% to 70%
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: Base regen increased from 2.5 to 3
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: Base Bullet Resist increased from 0% to 10%
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: Bullet Resist per boon reduced from 2.5% to 1.6% (same overall bullet resist at max)
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: {{PageRef|Hook}} Hook range reduced from 40m to 35m
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: {{PageRef|Hook}} Hook T2 increased from +25m to +30m
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: {{PageRef|Exploding Uppercut}} Exploding Uppercut now has a slight angle limitation to prevent straight-up direction
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: {{PageRef|Exploding Uppercut}} Exploding Uppercut radius increased from 10m to 14m
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: {{PageRef|Exploding Uppercut}} Exploding Uppercut T1 increased from -10s Cooldown to -11s
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: Fixed hooking through veils sometimes not working
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} Sticky Bomb radius increased from 10m to 12m
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} Sticky Bomb can now be cast on self using alt cast hotkey
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: {{PageRef|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam T2 reduced from +140 to +100
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: {{PageRef|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam spirit scaling increased from 2.4 to 3.0
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: {{PageRef|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam turn rate improved by 10%
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: {{PageRef|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam nearby radius increased from 4.5m to 5m
* {{PageRef|Bebop}} Bebop: {{PageRef|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam nearby damage now does 25% less than the full amount
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}} Dynamo: {{PageRef|Rejuvenating Aurora}} Rejuvenating Aurora can now be canceled by using stamina instead of needing to manually exit first (pre T3)
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}} Dynamo: Fixed {{PageRef|Kinetic {{PageRef|Pulse}} Pulse}} Kinetic {{PageRef|Pulse}} Pulse sometimes getting caught on stairs
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}} Dynamo: {{PageRef|Singularity}} Singularity now has a 0.1s cast point
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}} Dynamo: {{PageRef|Kinetic {{PageRef|Pulse}} Pulse}} Kinetic {{PageRef|Pulse}} Pulse width increased from 4.5m to 5m
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}} Dynamo: {{PageRef|Kinetic {{PageRef|Pulse}} Pulse}} Kinetic {{PageRef|Pulse}} Pulse T3 increased from +115 Damage to +125
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}} Grey Talon: {{PageRef|Charged Shot}} Charged Shot collision radius reduced by 10%
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}} Grey Talon: Fixed T3 {{PageRef|Guided Owl}} Guided Owl not triggering correctly sometimes when the target has {{PageRef|Spirit Armor}} Spirit Armor

* {{PageRef|Haze}} Haze: {{PageRef|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger now puts you in a brief drowsy state for 0.25s seconds where you move slowly before falling asleep (you still have the ability to shoot/cast/move/etc during this period)
* {{PageRef|Haze}} Haze: {{PageRef|Fixation}} Fixation T2 from +6s Duration to +5s
* {{PageRef|Haze}} Haze: {{PageRef|Fixation}} Fixation T3 reduced from +0.25 to +0.2
* {{PageRef|Haze}} Haze: {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} Bullet Dance T1 increased from +6 to +7
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: Fixed melee still going through when casting {{PageRef|Stone Form}} Stone Form after initiating a melee attack
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: {{PageRef|Stone Form}} Stone Form T2 stun reduced from 0.75s to 0.5s
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: {{PageRef|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant T1 reduced from +15% Fire Rate to +10%

* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: Now has a new ultimate ability, {{PageRef|Air Drop}} Air Drop. Take flight with an Ally (or self-cast to carry a bomb). You fly and drop the ally or bomb onto an area, dealing damage, slowing, and silencing enemies. {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy and the ally gain a bullet shield when they are dropped. Allies can drop by themselves at any time. When using the ability without an ally (carrying a bomb), it has a 1 second cast time.
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}} Kelvin: {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam no longer applies a Disarm
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}} Kelvin: {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam now slows Fire Rate (same values as slow)
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}} Kelvin: {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam max slow reduced from 90% to 60%
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}} Kelvin: {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam time to reach max slow increased from 1.2s to 2s
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}} Kelvin: {{PageRef|Frozen Shelter}} Frozen Shelter can now be cast while using {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam
* {{PageRef|Lash}} Lash: Health per boon increased from 37 to 42
* {{PageRef|Lash}} Lash: Base spirit resist increased from 8% to 15%
* {{PageRef|Lash}} Lash: {{PageRef|Flog}} Flog cooldown reduced from 30s to 25s
* {{PageRef|Lash}} Lash: {{PageRef|Flog}} Flog T3 now also reduces Fire Rate by 35%
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}} McGinnis: Speed while shooting increased from 55% to 70%
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}} McGinnis: {{PageRef|Mini Turret}} Mini Turrets now prioritize any heroes {{PageRef|McGinnis}} McGinnis is shooting at
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}} McGinnis: {{PageRef|Medicinal Specter}} Medicinal Specter duration Spirit Power scaling increased from 0.09 to 0.12
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}} McGinnis: {{PageRef|Heavy {{PageRef|Barrage}} Barrage}} Heavy {{PageRef|Barrage}} Barrage T1 changed to Rockets apply 35% slow
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}} Mo & Krill: {{PageRef|Scorn}} Scorn T3 now affects all damage types
* {{PageRef|Paradox}} Paradox: Base ammo reduced from 45 to 40
* {{PageRef|Paradox}} Paradox: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine projectile size reduced by 10%
* {{PageRef|Paradox}} Paradox: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine cooldown increased from 24s to 28s
* {{PageRef|Paradox}} Paradox: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine speed duration reduced from 4s to 3.5s
* {{PageRef|Paradox}} Paradox: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine no longer affects channels, cast times or things like {{PageRef|Lash}} Lash's {{PageRef|Death Slam}} Death Slam
* {{PageRef|Paradox}} Paradox: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine T1 reduced from +0.75s Max Stop duration to +0.5s
* {{PageRef|Paradox}} Paradox: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine T2 cd reduction increased from -8s to -10s
* {{PageRef|Paradox}} Paradox: {{PageRef|Time Wall}} Time Wall T3 silence duration reduced from 3.5s to 3s
* {{PageRef|Paradox}} Paradox: {{PageRef|Paradox}} {{PageRef|Paradoxical Swap}} Paradoxical Swap projectile size reduced by 10%
* {{PageRef|Pocket}} Pocket: {{PageRef|Barrage}} Barrage now respects line of sight
* {{PageRef|Pocket}} Pocket: {{PageRef|Barrage}} Barrage amp effect now shows on {{PageRef|Pocket}} Pocket
* {{PageRef|Pocket}} Pocket: Base Bullet Resist increased from -15% to 0%
* {{PageRef|Pocket}} Pocket: Base Spirit Resist reduced from 0% to -15%
* {{PageRef|Pocket}} Pocket: {{PageRef|Barrage}} Barrage Amp per stack reduced from 10% to 8%
* {{PageRef|Pocket}} Pocket: {{PageRef|Barrage}} Barrage T3 changed to +5% Amp Per Stack
* {{PageRef|Pocket}} Pocket: Fixed the camera moving too slowly after teleporting with Cloak
* {{PageRef|Seven}} Seven: Fixed multiple instances of {{PageRef|Static Charge}} Static Charge not working correctly
* {{PageRef|Seven}} Seven: {{PageRef|Lightning Ball}} Lightning Ball duration increased from 4s to 5s
* {{PageRef|Seven}} Seven: {{PageRef|Static Charge}} Static Charge stun delay reduced from 4s to 3.5s
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}} Vindicta: {{PageRef|Stake}} Stake base duration reduced from 2.5s to 2.25s
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}} Vindicta: {{PageRef|Stake}} Stake T1 duration reduced from 1s to 0.75s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: Fixed {{PageRef|Splatter}} Splatter direct hits counting as the second hit
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: Fix Damage prevention after being hit by {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous' {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball being reduced by {{PageRef|Debuff Reducer}} Debuff Reducer
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: {{PageRef|The Cube}} The Cube cast range increased from 25m to 30m
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: {{PageRef|The Cube}} The Cube T2 cooldown reduced from -25s to -22s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: {{PageRef|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch now deals light melee damage and is affected by melee items
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: {{PageRef|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch Charge Delay increased from 0.5s to 1.5s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball duration reduced from 12s to 10s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball T1 duration reduced from +6s to +5s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball cooldown increased from 80s to 90s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball now deals 50% damage to bosses
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball spirit resist reduced from 80% to 70%
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball bullet resist reduced from 70% to 60%
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball can now only stun and damage a target once every 1.5s, up from once every 1.0s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball acceleration lowered a bit
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: Stunning or immobilizing {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous now stops the ball from moving, and prevents him from doing damage and stunning
* {{PageRef|Warden}} Warden: {{PageRef|Binding Word}} Binding Word no longer drains 1 stamina
* {{PageRef|Warden}} Warden: {{PageRef|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask cooldown reduced from 16s to 13s
* {{PageRef|Warden}} Warden: {{PageRef|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask T2 changed from -10s Cooldown to Drains 1 Stamina
* {{PageRef|Warden}} Warden: {{PageRef|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask T3 now also reduces cooldown by -7s
* {{PageRef|Warden}} Warden: {{PageRef|Binding Word}} Binding Word immobilize duration reduced from 2s to 1.75
* {{PageRef|Warden}} Warden: {{PageRef|Binding Word}} Binding Word now has a quick cast behavior (same as {{PageRef|Static Charge}} Static Charge)
* {{PageRef|Wraith}} Wraith: {{PageRef|Card Trick}} Card Trick now has 0.5s cd per cast
* {{PageRef|Wraith}} Wraith: {{PageRef|Telekinesis}} Telekinesis T2 duration reduced from +0.75s to +0.5s
* {{PageRef|Wraith}} Wraith: {{PageRef|Full Auto}} Full Auto T2 changed to Imbues Bullets with +5 Spirit Damage (only affects {{PageRef|Wraith}} Wraith)
* {{PageRef|Wraith}} Wraith: Fixed being able to melee and parry while stunned by {{PageRef|Wraith}} Wraith's {{PageRef|Telekinesis}} Telekinesis
* {{PageRef|Yamato}} Yamato: Base melee damage increased by 10%
* {{PageRef|Yamato}} Yamato: {{PageRef|Flying Strike}} Flying Strike T3 now procs after the ability ends, rather than when connecting to the target
